hero.name: Rizqiansyah Ramadhan.
hero.bio: An undergraduate Software Engineering student specializing in backend development, with experience in building and managing APIs. Proficient with a diverse tech stack including Go (Golang), Express, NestJS, Flask, and Laravel. Skilled in various databases and familiar with mobile development using Flutter. Eager to learn and contribute to impactful projects.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of a backend developer with code or servers

experience.currentFocus: Currently focused on gaining practical experience and completing my education at

sanken.description1: Conducted quality checks on refrigerator units to ensure compliance with company standards.
sanken.description2: Collaborated with the production team to identify and resolve defects during the manufacturing process.

visionet.position: One Day Experience as IT Team
visionet.description1: Participated in a brief training as part of the IT team for practical experience.

aboutMe.paragraph1: An undergraduate Software Engineering student at Global Institute Technology And Business with a specialization in backend development. I have experience building and managing APIs using a diverse tech stack including Go (Golang), Express, NestJS, Flask, and Laravel.
aboutMe.paragraph2: Skilled in various databases like MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, and Firebase, with a solid understanding of frontend integration.  Also familiar with mobile development using Flutter.
aboutMe.quote: Driven by a curiosity for how technologies connect to create great products. I'm eager to grow and contribute my skills within a collaborative team.

projects.noProjectsFound: No projects found in this category.

portfolio.name: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: A dynamic and responsive personal portfolio website built with React.js for an interactive user interface. It features multilingual functionality using i18next to reach a broader audience, along with a modern design to effectively showcase projects and skills.

catMarketplace.name: Cat Marketplace with Native PHP
catMarketplace.description: An e-commerce platform developed with native PHP, dedicated to the cat lover community. This application allows users to safely buy and sell purebred cats, equipped with essential features like advanced search, filtering by breed or location, and an intuitive shopping cart system.

socialMediaApi.name: Social Media API
socialMediaApi.description: A RESTful API that serves as the backbone for a social media application. Built to manage user data, secure token-based authentication, post creation and management, and social interaction features like likes and comments.

magicScrollApi.name: Magic Scroll API
magicScrollApi.description: A backend API designed specifically for a digital note-taking application. This API provides endpoints to create, read, update, and delete notes, equipped with advanced functionalities like bookmarks and text highlighting.

sistemInformasiKKN.name: Community Service Program Information System
sistemInformasiKKN.description: A web-based information system aimed at digitizing and simplifying the registration and management process for a Student Community Service program (KKN/KKP). This application facilitates the workflow from student registration to activity reporting.

happinessOverloadApiV1.name: Happiness Overload API v1
happinessOverloadApiV1.description: The initial version of a social media API designed to handle core operations such as user registration, login, and the ability to create and interact with posts. This project serves as the foundation for developing more complex features in the future.

happinessOverloadApiV2.name: Happiness Overload API v2
happinessOverloadApiV2.description: The second iteration of the Happiness Overload API, delivering significant improvements in performance and scalability. This version introduces a more mature architecture, database query optimization, and new features like a notification system and a personalized feed.

magicScrollApiV2.name: Magic Scroll API v2
magicScrollApiV2.description: An enhancement of the Magic Scroll API with a restructured architecture to improve modularity and maintainability. This version adds real-time collaboration on notes and cross-device synchronization.

catShopApiWithExpress.name: Cat Shop Api With Express
catShopApiWithExpress.description: A backend API built with Express.js to support a specialized e-commerce application for selling cats. This API offers richer functionality, including inventory management, a product review and rating system, and user transaction history.

simpleFlutterTodo.name: Simple Flutter Todo
simpleFlutterTodo.description: A functional cross-platform mobile application for managing daily to-do lists. Built with Flutter, this app offers a clean and intuitive interface to add, complete, and delete tasks on both Android and iOS.

gunApiWithFlask.name: Gun API with Flask
gunApiWithFlask.description: A RESTful API developed with Python's Flask framework, serving as a database and provider of detailed information about various types of firearms. The API provides endpoints to access specification data, history, and images.

uasMobile.name: UAS Mobile (GO Book)
uasMobile.description: GoBook is a book management and exploration application designed to help users easily discover, save, and manage their favorite books.

eBookApi.name: E-Book API with Standardized API
eBookApi.description: A backend API designed following best practices and RESTful standards for an e-book reader application. This API manages digital book collections, user data, reading progress, and notes with a consistent endpoint design.

rekomendasiJurusanLaravel.name: Major Recommendation with Laravel
rekomendasiJurusanLaravel.description: A web application built with Laravel that functions as a Decision Support System (DSS) to provide university major recommendations. This system implements the Simple Additive Weighting (SAW) method to process and analyze student academic scores, then generates a ranking of the most suitable majors based on predetermined criteria.

carPaintServer.name: Car Paint Server
carPaintServer.description: A backend server dedicated to a car paint catalog application. This server provides structured data on various brands, types, and color codes of paint, enabling client applications to display product information accurately.

project3.name: Project 3
project3.description: A mobile-based Point of Sale (POS) application created to simplify the ordering and management process at a 'Bakso Pentol' stall. This application was developed as a digital solution for admins/cashiers, focusing on efficient management of products, orders, and transactions.

contact.name: Rizqiansyah Ramadhan
contact.connectDescription: Feel free to reach out if you're looking for a backend developer or want to discuss a project.
